replies.author: pedroigor

timeline.bodyText:
Could you include issued_token_type and set it to urn:ietf:params:oauth:token-type:saml2. See https://tools.ietf.org/id/draft-ietf-oauth-token-exchange-19.html#rfc.section.3.
I guess that would mean creating a TokenExchangeResponse extending AccessTokenResponse ? Reason being that we use that new class only for token exchange and don't touch the oauth2 part. Also easier to support additional parameters in the future that could be specific of exchange.
